content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per your command, I browsed the EF website and found that they offer language courses, cultural exchange programs, academic programs, and corporate education programs for individuals and companies of all ages and levels. They also offer au pair programs for young adults. EF has offices worldwide and provides online English language courses through EF English Live. They also have a private international school, EF Academy, and a business school, Hult International Business School.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "top language schools in the world"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.goabroad.com/articles/language-study-abroad/best-language-schools-in-the-world", "https://www.dreamstudiesabroad.com/articles/most-popular-language-schools", "https://www.gooverseas.com/community-choice-awards/language-schools", "https://globalscholarships.com/best-languages-schools-world/", "https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools/english", "https://www.topuniversities.com/university-rankings/university-subject-rankings/2022/modern-languages", "https://www.cactusworldwide.com/blog/2014/08/12/top-10-language-schools/", "https://www.middlebury.edu/language-schools/blog/worlds-best-language-immersion-school"]'}]
"""
